document_data.name: Train Vegetation
document_data.mainbody: '''''Train vegetation''''' was a [[spell]] that was used to repair [[spelljammer]]s.
document_data.Effects: The spell allowed the caster to sculpt wood. The caster was also able to cultivate, prune, and train living plants for up to {{SI|100|yd}} from the caster. The spell manipulated wood by bending, lengthening, shortening, thinning, thickening, and twisting it. The spell did not allow the caster to alter the actual matter of a plant.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required [[material component]]s: an acorn, a small branch with a leaf still attached, and a green [[gem]] with a value of at least 500 [[gp]].
document_data.History: This spell was created by [[wizard]]s of the [[Elven Imperial Fleet]]. The goal was to create a spell that allowed for rapid repairs to elven [[spelljammer]]s.
